sqlMap.select: SELECT s.created_date AS createdDate, e.first_name||' '||e.last_name AS employeeName, SUM(s.star_after)-SUM(s.star_before) AS appraisalStar FROM stars s, employees e WHERE s.user_domain=e.user_domain group by s.created_date, e.first_name||' '||e.last_name

SELECT s.created_date AS createdDate, e.first_name||' '||e.last_name AS employeeName, SUM(s.star_after)-SUM(s.star_before) AS appraisalStar FROM stars s, employees e WHERE s.user_domain=e.user_domain AND star_id=$starId$ group by s.created_date, e.first_name||' '||e.last_name
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO star (star_id, user_domain, description, star_before, star_after, created_by, created_date) VALUES ($star_id_sequence.NEXTVAL$, #userDomain#, #description#, $starBefore$, $starAfter$, #sessionUserDomain#, SYSDATE)
